entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
